code: function parseJwt(token){if(!token){return;}var base64Url=token.split(".")[1];var base64=base64Url.replace("-","+").replace("_","/");return JSON.parse(window.atob(base64));}export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){if(typeof window=="undefined"){return false;}if(localStorage.getItem("access_token")){console.log(localStorage.getItem("access_token"));console.log(parseJwt(localStorage.getItem("access_token")));return parseJwt(localStorage.getItem("access_token"));}else{return false;}};export var signout=function signout(){if(typeof window!=="undefined"){try{localStorage.removeItem("jwt");localStorage.clear();window.location.href="/";}catch(error){console.log(error);}}};
